44401.「こ…こんにちは。私は ここで\n 駅弁売りの お仕事をしています……。\n ひ:
He-hello. I work here as the train station's lunch
box vendor... Would you happen to be buying a bento
box?<yesno><break>

44402.「そうでしたか。\n それなら いいのです……。: Is that so. Then, that's fine...

44403.「ごめんなさい。お弁当 売り切れなんです……。\n も……文句がおありなら ホー:
Sorry, the bento boxes are sold out... If-if you have any complaints, tell them to that cute-eyed geezer, Hollow...!
That man with his cute face is the one who always buys up all the bento boxes...

105635.「が…岳都ガタラ駅へ ようこそ。\n この度 駅員として働くことになったのですが:
We-welcome to Gatara Station. Now I work here as the
train station's attendant, but there's lots I don't
know about and I'm learning everyday.
